subject: Tennis, Table
Athletics and Sports
Deaths (Obituaries)
lead_paragraph: At just over 5 feet tall but with nimble footwork and a rocketing forehand, Mr. Pagliaro won the national championship in 1940-42 and 1952.
snippet: At just over 5 feet tall but with nimble footwork and a rocketing forehand, Mr. Pagliaro won the national championship in 1940-42 and 1952.
